err.doc: The pintype field does not contain a valid [IiOoSsBbJjXx] character.
The given line does not conform to legal SPF syntax. If token is 'CR', there are probably missing elements on the line.
The given node is not declared in the current net.

err.msg: Net '%s' with mismatching total capacitance (total=%gpf, sum=%gpf)\n
err.doc: The total capacitance already associated with a net in a design does not match the value given for the total capacitance for the net in the SPF file.
A missing or invalid character used to specify the hierarchy divider.
A missing or invalid character used to specify the name delimiter.
Illegal syntax used to specify bus delimiters in the BUSBIT section.
The name of the design to be annotated is not specified in the SPF file.
The design entity specified for annotation does not exist. Either the netlist has not been loaded yet or the names do not match.
Illegal specification of capacitance unit. Legal values are ff, pf, nf, uf, mf, kf. The final 'f' is optional and case is irrelevant.
Illegal specification of resistance unit. Legal values are f, p, n, u, m, k. The case is irrelevant.

err.msg: Device or instance '%s' cannot be found (line %d)\n
err.doc: The object specified for connection to the parasitic network does not exist.

err.msg: Connector of transistor '%s' named '%s' cannot be found (line %d)\n
err.doc: The name used to specify the transistor connector is invalid. Legal names are g, d, s, b.

err.msg: Connector of transistor '%s' named '%s' might be connected to the wrong signal (line %d)\n
err.doc: There may be an incoherance in the parasitic file.
The instance specified for connection to the parasitic network does not exist.

err.msg: Connector of instance '%s' named '%s' cannot be found (line %d)\n
err.doc: The name used to specify the instance connector is invalid.
The external pin specified for connection to the parasitic network does not exist.

err.msg: Connector named '%s' is on the wrong equipotential (line %d)\n
err.doc: There may be an incoherance in the parasitic file.
A negative value was used to specify a capacitance, this is ignored.
A negative value was used to specify a resistance, this is ignored.
Signals specified in the parasitic file do not exist in the netlist.

err.msg: Don't know how to handle connector '%s' for resistor annotation (line %d)\n
err.doc: The handled names for resistor connectors are 'pos', 'neg' , '1' and '2'.
Signal can not be found in netlist to annotate.
The dspf file was not found.

err.msg: RC Network declaration for signal '%s' continued at line %d\n
err.doc: Multiple consecutive declarations for the signal have been detected. They will be merged.

err.msg: Don't know how to handle capacitance/diode connector '%s' for capacitance/diode annotation (line %d)\n
err.doc: The handled names for capacitance and diode connectors are '1' and '2'.

err.msg: No declaration of crosstalk capacitance node '%s' (line %d), associated with net '%s'\n
Node '%s' (line %d) could not be created, coupling capacitance to this node will be ignored\n
err.doc: A coupling capacitance to a non existant signal in the netlist will be ignored.
